quote: An itchy feeling began to work its way through my body, as though a thousand mosquitoes were circulating through my blood, biting me from the inside, making me want to scream, jump, squirm. I ran.
quote_letters: AN ITCHY FEELING BEGAN TO WORK ITS WAY THROUGH MY BODY AS THOUGH A THOUSAND MOSQUITOES WERE CIRCULATING THROUGH MY BLOOD BITING ME FROM THE INSIDE MAKING ME WANT TO SCREAM JUMP SQUIRM I RAN
